bibl.title: English translation [from Spanish] of newspaper clipping, [La Discusion], December 22, 1900 (See Spanish original)

div1.head: English translation [from Spanish] of newspaper clipping, [La Discusion], December 22, 1900 (See Spanish original.)
div1.p:
Last night there were more than 60 registered to
participate in the banquet the medical body of Havana is
offering as a homage to the diligence and talent of Dr.
Finlay.

The dinner will be held in the Delmonico Room today,
Saturday, the 22nd at 7:30PM and General Wood and other
prominent members of the administrative government are
invited.

Speakers include Dr. Tamayo, a member of the American
commission, Dr. Finlay and Dr. Guiteras, who will offer at the
end of the meal, the exquisite gift, that, as a memento,
colleagues dedicate to the distinguished cuban whose work they
celebrate. The gift consists of a magnificent bronze statue,
replica of "The Thinker" and that carries the signature of a
famous sculptor from Paris. A plaque with a dedication
accompanies the plaque.

We will end for today by transcribing the magnificent dinner
menu and thank Dr. Francisco Dominguer Roldán for the reports that
he has provided and for the interest that he has taken for how
much he tends to uplift and dignify the Country we love so
much.
